game.name: Hot Springs Story 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 현관 너머 펼쳐지는 꿈의 공간. 온기 가득한 온천 여관 게임. 다양한 추가 요소로 볼륨 업!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A "hot" new hot springs resort sim with a ton of new exclusive features!

reviewHighlights.text: This one is my fav so far of all the Kariosoft games! I own many! Can't wait for more to come out! Super relaxing and can play for hours and hours. No...
